duties_responsibilities.duty: Engage prescribers and support staff to present a new medication in the allergy space.
Set up appointments with key physicians and office staff using Ring Central
Virtually present the company Master Visual Aid to prescribers
Review the procurement process for the prescription medication with the office manager and reimbursement specialist
Enter account information on the office and office personnel using VEEVA
Collaborate with field leadership and field representatives to align on best practices and territory opportunities
